phrs.translation: 夺取, 掠夺, 抢夺

sentences.sentence: The diseases usually can despoil of young.
sentences.translation: 这些疾病常会夺走年轻的生命。

sentences.sentence: And tremble and despoil themselves: o hear!
sentences.translation: 颤抖着自我掠夺起来：哦听！

sentences.sentence: And tremble and despoil themselves: oh, hear!
sentences.translation: 战栗着自行凋落；听，哦，听！
